call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - September 11th

decisions.decision: Odie has taken over the Sigmanauts Twitter account
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To bring activity back to the dormant Twitter account
decisions.quote: He just took over the Sigmanauts Twitter

decisions.decision: Will integrate GoFundMe option into next Ergo Raffle for fiat users
decisions.speaker: qx()
decisions.context: To improve accessibility for users who find crypto too complicated to use
decisions.quote: I think I'll integrate that into at least the tech side of Next Ergo Raffle that the SIGs do is do a side go fund me for it for fiat users

commitments.commitment: Ship infrastructure machines to increase P2P infrastructure
commitments.quote: I just have to swing by USPS on the way home by today, tomorrow, Friday

commitments.commitment: Move ergoplatform.org website completely off Google hosting to community infrastructure
commitments.quote: I think the next target is to infra the ergoplatform.org website completely

commitments.commitment: Post text in main Telegram chat after the call
commitments.quote: composing some text also will post in the main Telegram chat just after the call

commitments.commitment: Test GitCircles and do airdrop to existing developer communities
commitments.quote: the plan, right is to, yeah, first to test it and then, to do kind of an airdrop to existing developer communities

open_questions.question: Whether DAO integration could automate GitHub PR approvals through voting
open_questions.context: Discussion about GitCircles and governance of open source communities

open_questions.question: What steps are needed to make Ergo more accessible and how to reduce them one by one
open_questions.context: Discussion about accessibility barriers for new users

key_facts.fact: DevNet has blocks every 30 seconds with 60 sub blocks per block, meaning 2 sub blocks per second
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: VoltPay does not support Apple Pay
key_facts.speaker: Grayman

key_facts.fact: HQ is currently in Pakistan helping flood victims
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Ergo meetup is scheduled for October 11th (Saturday) with Friday arrivals and Sunday breakfast
key_facts.speaker: qx()
